original_text: As a result, God has given you all the things that you need. You are able to speak everything that he wants you to speak. You are able to understand everything that he wants you to know.
korean_text: 이는 너희가 그 안에서 모든 일 곧 모든 언변과 모든 지식에 풍족하므로

sentences.original_text: As a result, God has given you
all the things that you need
everything that he wants you to speak
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희에게 말하길 원하시는 모든 것을

sentences.original_text: everything that he wants you to know
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희가 알기를 원하시는 모든 것을
